'''High Priestess Saewyn''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|As you approach, a wood elf straightens over an altar to Gaun. Her robes mark her as a high priestess.

She arches and cracks her back loudly, a satisfied grin spreading across her face soon after.

She smiles at the sight of a stranger.}}
The head of the Dawnstars in the Deadfire Archipelago, Saewyn is a sprightly wood elf and a fervent believer in Eothas and Gaun. She interprets the return of their god as a sign that all wrongs shall be righted. Until they are, the Dawnstars will work hard to remedy what they can. Unfortunately, they are running into problems with alarming regularity, as was the case when they tried sending food to the Gullet two years back, only to have it confiscated by the guards and sent to the Palace for "sharing".

|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Food for Thought](/foodForThought/): She can greenlight food deliveries... Assuming you can get them through and have a high enough standing with the Dawnstars.
[Category:The Sacred Stair characters](/categoryTheSacredStairCharacters/)
[Category:Temple of Gaun characters](/categoryTempleOfGaunCharacters/)
